version_description:
• Enhancements and minor bug fixes.

We keep making our Great Apps Even Better!

COMING UP NEXT THIS FALL*
• Support for new iOS 9 Slide Over and Split View features on iPad!
• Support for Apple Watch!

* At no extra cost.

• Support for iOS 9
• New Gorgeous Background Photos!
• Displays Date & Time Exchange Rates Updated
• Support for Slide Over* and Split View** On iPad
• Portrait & Landscape Modes on iPad
• Added Support for Convertible Cuban Peso

IMPORTANT:
* iOS 9 supports Slide Over on iPad Air and iPad mini 2 (or more recent).
** iOS 9 supports Split View on iPad Air 2 (or more recent).

• New app name!
• Copy and Paste amounts - New!
• Exchange rate shown with greater precision (5+ digits).

Thanks for making Travel Currency Converter such a popular app!

NEW NAME • Go! Currency Converter

Minor enhancements and bug fixes.

● Improved search for currencies
● Quick access to your commonly used currencies
● New Upgrade available with more features

4.0.1

Minor bug fix.

4.0

● Improved search for currencies
● Quick access to your commonly used currencies
● New Upgrade available with more features

• New beautiful bonus photos included with in-app upgrade!
• One of the most beautiful app on iPhone X!
• Optimized for iOS 11.
• Now remembers your last Tip percentage.

• New Share feature.
• New beautiful bonus photos included with in-app upgrade.
• One of the most beautiful app on iPhone X!
• Optimized for iOS 11.
• Now remembers your last Tip percentage.
• Fixed iPad display bug.

Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Changes for GDPR.

Support for iOS 13
Bug fix on iOS 12
Minor bug fix. Same great app.
